original_text: You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. Somebody must have told you these things from the beginning. You should have understood it all since the time that God made the earth. You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. Somebody must have told you these things from the beginning. You should have understood it all since the time that God made the earth. You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. Somebody must have told you these things from the beginning. You should have understood it all since the time that God made the earth. You must surely know what is true! You must have heard about it. Somebody must have told you these things from the beginning. You should have understood it all since the time that God made the earth. You must surely know what is true!
korean_text: 너희가 알지 못하였느냐 너희가 듣지 못하였느냐 태초부터 너희에게 전하지 아니하였느냐 땅의 기초가 창조될 때부터 너희가 깨닫지 못하였느냐

sentences.original_text: You must surely know what is true!
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 참된 것이 무엇인지 분명히 알아야 합니다!

sentences.original_text: You must have heard about it.
Somebody must have told you these things
from the beginning.
You should have understood it all
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 모든 것을 이해했어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: since the time that God made the earth.
